org.springframework.beans

类 MethodInvocationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException
            • org.springframework.beans.BeansException
              • org.springframework.beans.PropertyAccessException
                • org.springframework.beans.MethodInvocationException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MethodInvocationException
extends PropertyAccessException
    Thrown when a bean property getter or setter method throws an exception, analogous to an InvocationTargetException.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String ERROR_CODE
      Error code that a method invocation error will be registered with.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MethodInvocationException(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent propertyChangeEvent, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Create a new MethodInvocationException.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getErrorCode()
      Return a corresponding error code for this type of exception.

      • 从类继承的方法 org.springframework.beans.PropertyAccessException

        getPropertyChangeEvent, getPropertyName, getValue

      • 从类继承的方法 org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException

        contains, getMessage, getMostSpecificCause, getRootCause

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Throwable

        addSuppressed, fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getStackTrace, getSuppressed, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • ERROR_CODE

        public static final java.lang.String ERROR_CODE
        Error code that a method invocation error will be registered with.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MethodInvocationException

        public MethodInvocationException(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent propertyChangeEvent,
                                 java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Create a new MethodInvocationException.
        参数:
        propertyChangeEvent - PropertyChangeEvent that resulted in an exception
        cause - the Throwable raised by the invoked method

    • 方法详细资料

      • getErrorCode

        public java.lang.String getErrorCode()
        从类复制的说明: PropertyAccessException
        Return a corresponding error code for this type of exception.
        指定者:
        getErrorCode 在类中 PropertyAccessException
